node.title: Bob Dole, former US senator and Republican presidential nominee, dies aged 98
node.alt: Bob Dole speaks from his chair.
node.description: The former US presidential nominee was diagnosed with advanced lung cancer in February and died in his sleep.
node.content: ["Bob Dole, who overcame grievous World War II\u00a0combat wounds to become a pre-eminent figure in US\u00a0politics as a longtime Republican senator from Kansas and his party's unsuccessful 1996 presidential nominee has\u00a0died, aged 98.", "Mr Dole, known for a wit that ranged from self-deprecating to caustic, died in his sleep, the Elizabeth Dole Foundation said.", "Mr Dole announced in February that he had been diagnosed with advanced lung cancer and would begin treatment.", "\"It is with heavy hearts we announce that Senator Robert Joseph Dole died early this morning,\" the foundation said in a statement on Twitter.", "\"He had served the United States of America faithfully for 79 years.\"", "More to come."]
